metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10672 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
treeRead in hdf/btree.c in libmysofa before 0.7 does not properly validate multiplications and additions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1').
